resume_text:
NAME: Bob Johnson
EMAIL: bob.johnson@email.com
PHONE: (555) 987-6543

SUMMARY:
Experienced DevOps Engineer with 7 years of experience in building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. Expertise in automation and orchestration.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Jenkins, Python, Linux

EXPERIENCE:
CloudTech Solutions - DevOps Engineer (2018 - Present)
- Designed and implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker.
- Managed AWS infrastructure using Terraform and Kubernetes.
Systems Automation Inc. - Systems Administrator (2016 - 2018)
- Maintained Linux servers and network infrastructure.
- Automated system administration tasks using Python scripts.

EDUCATION:
Stanford University - Master's in Computer Engineering (2016)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect
